name: Creature Lands - 2D Action RPG
description:
Enter the World of Creature Lands!👹
2D Action RPG Experience in a magic world full of unique creatures.

Defeat waves of Creatures in each Level and progress until you find the Boss of each area. Once you beat him a new area will be available to hack and slash all of its Creatures! Watch the trailer and dive into the world of Creature Lands!

⚔️ Dungeon System with waves of creatures!
🛡️ Fully customizable hero character!
⚔️ Equip and Enhance Legendary Equipment!
🛡️ Unlock Elemental Magic Skills!
⚔️ Unique levels, creatures, equipment and magic skills!
🛡️ Travel to different Lands each with many hand drawn environments!
⚔️ Epic and Rewarding Boss Fights!

Creature Lands awaits you to travel through dangerous lands full of creatures. A 2D Action RPG experience for mobile.👹

Controls:

Movement: W-A-S-D or Arrow Keys

Jump: Space Button:

Attack: Left Mouse Button:

Magic Skills: 1,  2, 3, 4
